feed.title: bknd Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.1.0
entry.content:
v0.1.0 (2024-11-28)

Feat: Auth and SSR improvements by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/3 * added cookie authentication * added additional permissions (system.access.admin and system.access.api) * improved asset handling and new build mechanism * full SSR compatibility and improved Next.js adapter

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.1.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • hotfix: cookies may not be added to static assets by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/8

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added astro adapter @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/5 & https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/9

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0
